attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immigration to the U.K. is out of control, all services are being
stretched to breaking point. 10,000 Immigrant offenders in our
prisons, the cost to tax payers is £30,000 for each prisoner per year. These people need to be deported immediately. Get this lousy Government out of office and replace them with an honest party willing to tackle immigration before this country becomes irreparable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
